text:
A checked out document can be edited using TinyMCE or/and using oneform editor.
In all other editors the lock prevents user from editing the document.
creator: ragaller@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The problem with the OneFormEditor is that checkPreconditions() is called first,
and lockInvolvedObjects() is called later. Therefore the error messages of the
object locking are not considered when setting the "executable" parameter.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Fixed for TinyMCE too.

If the problem occurs again (or with other editors), please reopen.
